channel.title: Quick question
channel.description:
I'm making a Fight Caves mini-game. When I'm done killing Jad, I want to be teleported back to the entrance of the arena, along with adding a fire cape to my inventory. How can I do this?
Rep++ for you if you can help.

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @qsmith qsmith
item.description:
@qsmith wrote:

make a portal that will telle you back and give fire cape[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2008, 07:20:30 PM[/size][hr]i dont even think about that lol

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @Leecher_Ian Leecher Ian
item.description:
@Leecher_Ian wrote:

in npc handler

                        if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2475) {
                            int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
                            client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

                            ppl.teleportToX = x;
                            ppl.teleportToY = y;
                            ppl.additem(6570  1);
                        }

not sure bout ppl.additem(6570 1);

part
